Sentencas: A Ni-samaria-doped ceria (SD(7) cermet was selected as the anode material for reduced temperature (800 degrees C) solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: High performance electrodes for reduced temperature solid oxide fuel cells with doped lanthanum gallate electrolyte I. Ni-SDC cermet anode

Sentencas: The NiO-SDC composite powder, synthesized by spray pyrolysis, was employed as the starting anode powder in this study.
Titulo: High performance electrodes for reduced temperature solid oxide fuel cells with doped lanthanum gallate electrolyte I. Ni-SDC cermet anode

Sentencas: The influence of Ni content in Ni-SDC cermets on the electrode performance was investigated in order to create the most suitable microstructures.
Titulo: High performance electrodes for reduced temperature solid oxide fuel cells with doped lanthanum gallate electrolyte I. Ni-SDC cermet anode

Sentencas: It was found that anodic polarization was strongly influenced by the Ni content in Ni-SDC cermets.
Titulo: High performance electrodes for reduced temperature solid oxide fuel cells with doped lanthanum gallate electrolyte I. Ni-SDC cermet anode

Sentencas: The best results were obtained for anode cermets with Ni content of around SO vol.%; anodic polarization was about 30 mV at a current density of 300 mA/cm(2).
Titulo: High performance electrodes for reduced temperature solid oxide fuel cells with doped lanthanum gallate electrolyte I. Ni-SDC cermet anode

Sentencas: This high performance seems to be attributable to the microstructure, in which Ni grains form a skeleton with well-connected SDC grains finely distributed over the Ni grains surfaces; such microstructure was also conducive to high stability of the anode.
Titulo: High performance electrodes for reduced temperature solid oxide fuel cells with doped lanthanum gallate electrolyte I. Ni-SDC cermet anode
